alert_uuid.description: Unique id to identify an alert.

state.description: State of the alert (e.g. missing| insertion etc.)

resolved.description: Resolution status of an alert. (e.g. True | False)

acknowledged.description: Alert is acknowldeged by the user or not. (e.g. True | False)

module_type.description: Type of the module. (e.g. PSU, FAN)

module_name.description: Name of the module. (e.g. Fan Module 4)
